body.name: KOHLER 3577-96 Well worth Classic Two-Piece Rount-Front Toilet, Water-Saving Toilet, Left-Hand Trip Lever, 1.28 GPF, Biscuit

features: Class Five flushing technology provides tremendous bulk waste flushing performance and best-in-class bowl cleanliness
Two-piece toilet. Seat and supply lines not included
Canister flush valve provides smooth flushing actuation with consistent water usage, flush after flush
1.28 gpf High-efficiency toilets provide significant water savings of up to 16,500 gallons per year versus an old 3.5 gallon toilet without sacrificing performance
body.description: Product Description We’ve led the way in our industry by staying true to our values: design, well-being, innovation, inclusion, and sustainability. Set on a firm foundation, our values have evolved to make room for new discoveries and advancements in how we understand ourselves, one another, the world we share. From the Manufacturer Wellworth toilets have been an American benchmark for innovation and performance for over 70 years. This Wellworth round-front toilet brings graceful design and superior functionality to the bathroom with the extraordinary flushing power of the Class Five

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Was exactly what we were looking for to go with the decor in my husbands bathroom.
reviews.reviewText: Was a bit worried when it came one piece at a time. Got it all before installers came. My husband had wanted a black toilet since he remodeled his bathroom. This was a surprise for his birthday. Bathroom now is complete and looks great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, color match and install service excellent
reviews.reviewText: We bought the toilet, didn't know we had to buy lid separately. This flushes quickly, the color was an identical match. The boxes were sort of mashed and came way before installation but the service man opened and checked out and no damage. Probably uses less water since it flushes so fast. Highly recommend the product and the Amazon service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars WORST TRANSACTION;item ARRIVED BROKEN TWICE; NO TOILET 5 WEEKS so far!!!
reviews.reviewText: This has been the nightmare of online purchasing from this seller. The original delivery came cracked + dumped in my front yard under a tree while I was away. I contacted the seller WELL BEFORE ANY delivery estimate to ask that it be delivered the latest possible days within the time frame I was given. Seller says "no control over delivery" even though they have a direct contact for the shipping company (how would they be able to set it up the delivery time in the first place?).Instead, there was a severe thunder/electrical storm that day when it was delivered. It was a total mess-leaves/tree branches down, etc. I didn't notice the cracked damage until I paid for a plumber to come out and install it- costing me $100. And, because it was cracked, it wasn't installed + I am out the money. I contacted the seller by email to give them a chance to make it right before giving a bad review or filing a damage claim with amazon. I ENDED UP WITH NO TOILET: i ONLY HAVE 1 BATHROOM + the old toilet had been taken away the morning of the plumber coming.So, I pleaded with this company that this was a SERIOUS situation + that I am a senior who has a hard time getting around---- would they PLEASE EXPEDITE????? No, I was told : we have a team processing system, and then it has to be reviewed, and this and then another department BEFORE ANY SHIPPING DATE/ESTIMATE was even available! I called, emailed and NO ONE WAS THE LEAST BIT HELPFUL, NO I was not given any assurance that this was a hygiene health item that needed priority. NO emails about when I could get a replacement. My emails were replied with WE ARE SORRY FOR THE INCONVENIENCE; still no assurance that it had been processed or when I could get my toilet.I told them I was out the $100 for plumbing service--they gave me a refund of $15! And, I still have to pay the plumber to come out again! NOW FOR THE SECOND EPISODE OF THIS TRAUMA: I received the replacement toilet (this time on my porch not under the tree......good sign I thought :) Low and behold, I tear open the box top and the front of the box in preparation to slide the toilet out...and this TOILET WAS BROKEN BIG TIME; NOT CRACKED LIKE THE ORIGINAL! it has pieces of porcelain, it is UPSIDE DOWN, and hugely damaged. I didn't even take it/or slide it out of the box for fear that I couldn't get it back in to return it. I took pictures of what I could (considering the inside of the box is dark) to verify the damage. This second damaged toilet really got to me. So, instead of contacting the seller- I contacted amazon directly to file a damage claim. That process is 14 days before I get my money back to buy a replacement, and then I have to start over with re-ordering another toilet- AND I STILL HAVE TO WAIT ANOTHER COUPLE OF WEEKS! So, I had to order it AND PAY UPFRONT with my money so I could have a toilet SOONER than another month! The first Amazon representative I spoke to regarding this claim was MORE WORRIED about getting my exact HOUSE NUMBER rather than the issue at hand! When giving personal information over an unsecured line---- including order #, email, full name + address (street name,city, zip code and state)---- what is the point of insisting that a house number be the FOCAL POINT when in fact---all information pointed to the EXACT TRANSACTION! I can't believe the insensitivity or rudeness of the amazon rep. I am a senior, and worried that someone might be listening in + having my exact house location.(I have had my car stolen from in front of my house, family heirlooms stolen from my house---- and the Amazon rep. is more worried about hammering me for a house # when they have ALL OF MY PERSONAL INFORMATION that was requested. WHO IN THE WORLD WOULD BE CALLING ABOUT A TOILET with the same name/same street/city/state/zipcode AND ORDER # and Email???????? If the info.being requested is strictly for verification-It is the rep.'s own personal vendetta to refuse to help me and constantly using the same "script procedure" rather than serving a customer who has a SERIOUS ISSUE. Instead of getting help; they continued to badger me about my house #. procedure without any kindness or consideration that the REAL ISSUE IS NOT HAVING A LIFE NECESSITY! I had to call back; give the same info. to another amazon rep. AND THIS TIME: the rep. accepted the info(without badgering me for an exact house #). and realized the seriousness of the situation. I was helped and was thoroughly thankful. When a procedure becomes more important than the emergency life need; it is sad indeed.UPDATE: June 12, 2013:Received the replacement toilet bowl today; ARRIVED BROKEN AGAIN! I CONTACTED AMAZON: This company claims they are still processing my refund..and meanwhile they received money upfront.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Operates quietly and efficiently as described. Great engineering. No clogs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Black on gray!
reviews.reviewText: This toilet came in a couple days. It as available in three sizes away from the wall.It was easy to install. Very well packaged. Beyond expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great price incorrect assembly
reviews.reviewText: Great price on this toilet, and Prime membership is a must or shipping is astronomical. That said, .the components in the toilet tank were incorrectly aligned, and hose was not properly connected to the overflow valve. No biggie. But I had to undo a few things and realign and adjust. Not that difficult. Again though, the price, with Amazon Prime, is absolutely unbeatable. Home Depot or Lowes would have easily been 40 to 50% higher. I am wholly satisfied with the purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2022
reviews.reviewText: loves the way it looks and functions!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for a black toilet
reviews.reviewText: We have a rental property that was last renovated around the time that Scar Face came out and the bathroom has interesting colours in it, including a black toilet. Other big box stores wanted twice as much for the toilet or more, so this was one of the lowest cost items that I could find in Canada or the US. It would be even better if they included a toilet seat with it, but I found one on Amazon for $30 or so. 6 months later the toilet is still working very well. I would highly recommend it to others wanting this look.
